subject: Junit Error: java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not create Service Provider: javax.naming.NamingException: Failed to initialize the ORB [Root exception is java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException]
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to implement JUnit for my project. I ran the sample testcased in my machine. But, while I am integrating with my project I am getting the
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to implement JUnit for my project. I ran
the sample testcased in my machine. But, while I am
integrating with my project I am getting the following
error:

java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not create Service
Provider: javax.naming.NamingException: Failed to
initialize the ORB [Root exception is
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException]
at Exception in thread "main"

Please anybody can help me out in this.

Thanks,

Madhavan
